titles.title: Compilation of published major and trace elements and Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf isotope ratios of Quaternary-age arc volcanic rocks from 9 arc settings

resource.publisher: EarthChem Library(ECL) | Interdisciplinary Earth Data Alliance (IEDA) | Columbia University; doi:10.17616/R3V644

subjects.subject: Regional (Continents, Oceans)

Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf isotopes
Quaternary-age arc volcanic rock
North Pacific Ocean
North Pacific volcanic arcs (Luzon to Cascades)

rightsList.rights: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States [CC BY-NC-SA 3.0]

descriptions.description: This compilation of published major element, trace element, and Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf isotope ratios of Quaternary-age arc volcanic rocks from 9 arc settings (Aleutian, Cascades, Izu-Bonin, Japan, Kamchatka, Kuriles, Luzon Taiwan, Mariana, and Ryukyu Arcs) was created in order to trace the compositions of the altered oceanic crust (AOC) on arc chemistry.
Related publications: Straub, S.M., Zellmer, G.F., 2012. Volcanic Arcs as Archives of Plate Tectonic Change. Gondwana Res, 21(2-3): 495-516

geoLocation.geoLocationPlace: North Pacific volcanic arcs (Luzon to Cascades)
